elements.name: To create job entry in json format

steps.name: request {  "jobId": '#(jobId)',"jobTitle": "Software Engg","jobDescription": "To develop andriod application","experience": ["Google","Apple","Mobile Iron"],"project": [{"projectName": "Movie App","technology": ["Kotlin","SQL Lite","Gradle","API Testing"]}]  }

1 > Connection: Keep-Alive

1 > Accept-Encoding: gzip,deflate

name: com/api/automation/putRequest/putRequest.feature

To update job entry in application
